Lines.Speech: [i]Pointedly moving around the spore area where Kt-7 lays, you continue further into the cavern system. You hear Yuu following behind.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Aww, Bossssss. Kt-7 was my favourite.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: That was kind of harsh, Scull.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Look, _I had no guarantee the filter module would work for those spores. _HQ said to prioritise the living, but I know how they work and they probably don't care as long as we retrieve the crystals.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: It's harsh, but that's our mission.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Oh well, Kt-7 was a bit weird anyway. Onwards and upwards... or in this case downwards.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Promise me we can recruit another half robo-_ OR EVEN BETTER JUST A ROBOT! I have a suuuubtle feeling my filter module could break down at anytime... if ya catch my drift?

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Woah! Yes Glados I catch your drift. I'll try.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Request to reschedule suit personality service to immediately upon return.

Lines.Speaker: COMMAND
Lines.Speech: Granted, on stipulation that those crystals are with you.
